issue.title: Lists order in metadata edition fails
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

When you have an stereotype "list" for an attribute in metadata model, the order of the list is based on item's ID and not on the ordering value.

_Very annoying if you want to make a list based on an alphabetic order._

The order should follow the "ordering value" definable in the backend for each list (actually, this ordering is currently unusable)

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0
